projects.title: A.MA.DIA (Association Malgache contre le Diab√®te) ‚Äì Hospital Information System
projects.description: an information system developed to support the daily operations of a hospital specializing in diabetes care in Madagascar. The system was designed to digitize and streamline the hospital‚Äôs workflow, covering key areas such as patient registration, consultation tracking, appointment scheduling, medical record management, and laboratory results. By centralizing data and automating administrative tasks, the platform improved the efficiency of hospital services, reduced paperwork, and facilitated better coordination between departments. The project aimed to modernize healthcare management and enhance the quality of care provided to diabetic patients.

projects.title: BICI(Bureau International de Consultance Informatique) ‚Äì Corporate Website for IT Consulting
projects.description: The BICI website was developed to enhance the company‚Äôs online presence and provide a centralized platform for showcasing its services, expertise, and client portfolio. Designed with both corporate communication and client engagement in mind, the site features a modern, responsive interface with dedicated sections for company information, project case studies, service offerings, and contact forms. It also integrates a secure admin panel for content management, enabling BICI to easily update and maintain the website. The goal was to reflect the company‚Äôs identity and professionalism while improving visibility and accessibility for potential clients and partners.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
